+#### RUN_PROBLEM_LISTS
+
+Use the problem lists to select tests instead of excluding them.
+
+Set to `true` or `false`.
+If `true`, JTReg will use `-match:` option, otherwise `-exclude:` will be used.
+Default is `false`.
+
